openstack_networking_floatingip_v2.description: Manages a V2 floating IP resource within OpenStack Neutron (networking).

region.description: The region in which to obtain the V2 Networking client.

description.description: Human-readable description for the floating IP.

pool.description: The name of the pool from which to obtain the floating

port_id.description: ID of an existing port with at least one IP address to

tenant_id.description: The target tenant ID in which to allocate the floating

address.description: The actual/specific floating IP to obtain. By default,

subnet_id.description: The subnet ID of the floating IP pool. Specify this if

tags.description: A set of string tags for the floating IP.

dns_name.description: The floating IP DNS name. Available, when Neutron DNS

dns_domain.description: The floating IP DNS domain. Available, when Neutron
